pages.text: - If you have not already, press F3 then H to enable advanced tooltips. There is NO NEED to install Mod Name Tooltip or anything similar.$(br2)- The search bar of Just Enough Items (JEI) can be quickly accessed from the inventory by pressing two keys: Ctrl + F

- Quark adds hotbar swapping from your inventory when you press Z then 1, 2 or 3.$(br2)- Don't engage in losing battles! Always come prepared, even if potion crafting is a bit of a long process.$(br2)- Iron, copper, gold and diamonds are easily obtainable AND renewable with the presence of Mystical Agriculture. USE THEM!

Use Create's Wand of Symmetry to make excavating in the Nether for Ancient Debris blocks easier! You can break 8 blocks around the mirror horizontally with the Octagonal setting or dig a single tunnel with the Mirror on the Z / X axis options!
